name: create-vhost
description: NodeJS tool to create new vhost on debian with apache/nginx.

scripts.start: node src/index.js --name monsite --domain monsite.com --subdomain www --subfolder site --port 8095 --hook "mlkff-FAF8!<!" --ssl && node src/index.js --name monsite --domain monsite.com --subdomain app --subfolder app --port 8095 --hook "mlkff-FAF8!<!" --ssl && node src/index.js --name mywebsite --domain mywebsite.com --port 8095 --hook "mlkff-FAF8!<!"
